name: Fortune Cookie Consent Policy WordPress Plugin
author: CodeRevolution

sections.description: EU law cookie consent policy plugin - a complete plugin that has every option for configuring the popup notice that fits best for your website and is fully compatible with every current law and regulation regarding cookie usage!
sections.changelog:
Version 1.0 Release Date 2016-11-26
  • First version released!
Version 1.0.1 Release Date 2016-11-28
  • Some minor fixes!
Version 1.1 Release Date 2016-02-03
  • Added multisite support!
